text: Best shop ever. The prices are great, service is the best 10/10. They even gave me feedback about what happened and gave me better reviews. It was a really great experience. Those wanting to fix bicycle or come here to servicing, this is a great shop to do so. Their fixing skills are way above average and they are fuss free transaction and so as well as fast servicing.
